Models¶

class comment.models.Comment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Comment model that describes comment entity.

The main idea is to document the class with

Parameters:
  • text – text of comment using CharField with max_length = 1024 symbols
  • created_at – date of comment’s create using datetime format
  • updated_at – date of comment’s update using datetime format
get_created_at()¶

This is a method to show date in Unix date format

Parameters:self – description
Returns:date in Unix date format
